TopicTitle: Completely Reusable ! (well at least that's what's I am aiming for)

Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbonauts!

My name is Mavis, and I am trying to make some Jet-Rocket hybrid carriers to carry respective tonnes to the 100 km orbit around kerbin and the catch is that all of them must be 1 stage (Say no to decoupling[!]), must climb to 20km with Jets and after that to the orbit with the rocket and the RCS. I use mods ,and i'll add the mod list to the last but sadly i will not upload files because I am not finished with any of these as I upgrade them every time I use them.

I have been able to make 3 of them recently and i would love to show them:

1st Craft: JET - ROCKET CARRIER SERIES 1 - DOME - 5 Tonnes to 100 km orbit

Javascript is disabled. View full album

2nd Craft:JET -ROCKET - CARRIER SERIES 1 - DINNER - 10 Tonnes to 100 km orbit

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I got a 3rd craft as well but its coming in a day! (I need to fix a lot for it)

(mod list in a day)

[ps. if I had some mistakes in writing please tell in PM]

Edited January 1, 2015 by MavisLenya
Just a little thing here, you can lift five tons into orbit with a skipper and an orange tank, no need to decouple or anything, and it's really cheap. Nice craft though
since i kinda do it for the looks of em and i like more complicated ones rather than simple ones
